Ok i finally fixed all the "programmatical" issues for
our project (btw. i guess we could be added to the
project list too, if you want details i could send you
a mail detailing the outlines of our project...) and
now i have a little question about heritrix'
performance: I startet a crawl on my machine (AMD64
3000+, 512 MB RAM) yesterday. This crawl is just
supposed to crawl one site
(http://www.angel-cloud.com/blog/) but it's still
working on it. I read the mails according benchmarks
so i guess it might be or it's more likely than not a
problem with the settings (i don't think that it's a
problem with my internet-connection as i use a
university network to access the internet) so now my
question is: what can be done to increase
performance??
